DOC.brief_title: Exparel Transversus Abdominis Plane Block v Intrathecal Analgesia In Colorectal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective To assess efficacy EXPAREL TAP block improve pain score 48 hour postoperatively , reduce total oral morphine equivalent ( OME ) use , compare standard Intrathecal opioid administration ( IT ) . Secondary Objective Assess length stay ( LOS ) , postoperative ileus ( POI ) incidence , use intravenous patient control analgesia ( PCA ) patient EXPAREL TAP bloc compare IT .
